FileFormat.FormatName: Raw PIMA SWIR Reflectance Spectral File
FileFormat.FormatDescription: These files store SWIR (short wave infrared) data which has been generated by a PIMA (Portable Infrared Mineral Analyser, a particular brand/type of spectrometer). They can be imported into early versions of 'The Spectral Geologist' software.

InternalSignature.SignatureName: Raw PIMA SWIR Reflectance Spectral File
InternalSignature.SignatureNote: Absolute from beginning of file, magic bytes: ISPLFOSâ€¦.
